00024 #ifndef OB_TETRAPLANAR_H
00025 #define OB_TETRAPLANAR_H
00026 
00027 #include "stereo.h"
00028 #include <algorithm> // std::rotate
00029 
00030 namespace OpenBabel {
00031 
00081   class OBAPI OBTetraPlanarStereo : public OBStereoBase
00082   {
00083     public:
00084       OBTetraPlanarStereo(OBMol *mol);
00085       virtual ~OBTetraPlanarStereo();
00086 
00087       template <typename ConfigType>
00088       static ConfigType ToConfig(const ConfigType &cfg, unsigned long start, 
00089           OBStereo::Shape shape = OBStereo::ShapeU)
00090       {
00091         ConfigType result = cfg;
00092         result.shape = shape;
00093 
00094         // convert from U/Z/4 to U shape
00095         switch (cfg.shape) {
00096           case OBStereo::ShapeU:
00097             break;
00098           case OBStereo::ShapeZ:
00099             OBStereo::Permutate(result.refs, 2, 3); // convert to U shape
00100             break;
00101           case OBStereo::Shape4:
00102             OBStereo::Permutate(result.refs, 1, 2); // convert to U shape
00103             break;
00104         }
00105 
00106     
00107         // since refs are U shaped we can rotate the refs lexicographically
00108         for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00109           std::rotate(result.refs.begin(), result.refs.begin() + 1, result.refs.end());
00110           // start at refs[0]?
00111           if (result.refs.at(0) == start)
00112             break;
00113         }
00114  
00115         // convert from U to desired U/Z/4
00116         // (don't change refs[0]!)
00117         switch (shape) {
00118           case OBStereo::ShapeU:
00119             break;
00120           case OBStereo::ShapeZ:
00121             OBStereo::Permutate(result.refs, 2, 3); // convert to Z shape
00122             break;
00123           case OBStereo::Shape4:
00124             OBStereo::Permutate(result.refs, 1, 2); // convert to 4 shape
00125             break;
00126         }
00127  
00128         return result;
00129       }
00135 //      static std::vector<unsigned long> ToInternal(const std::vector<unsigned long> &refs, 
00137 
00142  //     static std::vector<unsigned long> ToShape(const std::vector<unsigned long> &refs, 
00143 //          OBStereo::Shape shape);
00144   
00145   };
00146 
00147 }
00148 
00149 #endif
